verses.verse: And it came to pass in those <S%H3117>days<s%>, that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> their <S%H4264>armies<s%> <S%H6908>together<s%> for <S%H6635>warfare<s%>, to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. And <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H3045>Know<s%> thou <S%H3045>assuredly<s%>, that thou shalt go <S%H3318>out<s%> with me to <S%H4264>battle<s%>, thou and thy <S%H582>men<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H397>Achish<s%>, <S%H3651>Surely<s%> thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> what thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> can <S%H6213>do<s%>. And <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, Therefore will I <S%H7760>make<s%> thee <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of mine <S%H7218>head<s%> for <S%H3117>ever<s%>.

¶ Now <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> was <S%H4191>dead<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H5594>lamented<s%> him, and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, even in his own <S%H5892>city<s%>. And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had put <S%H5493>away<s%> those that had familiar <S%H178>spirits<s%>, and the <S%H3049>wizards<s%>, out of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6908>together<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H7766>Shunem<s%>: and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6908>together<s%>, and they <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H1533>Gilboa<s%>.
And when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, he was <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, and his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H2729>trembled<s%>.

And when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him not, neither by <S%H2472>dreams<s%>, nor by <S%H224>Urim<s%>, nor by <S%H5030>prophets<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> unto his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H1245>Seek<s%> me a <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H1172>hath<s%> a familiar <S%H178>spirit<s%>, that I may <S%H3212>go<s%> to her, and <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of her. And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Behold, there is a <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H1172>hath<s%> a familiar <S%H178>spirit<s%> at <S%H5874>En-dor<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H2664>disguised<s%> himself, and put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>raiment<s%>, and he <S%H3212>went<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> with him, and they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H802>woman<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%>, I pray thee, <S%H7080>divine<s%> unto me by the familiar <S%H178>spirit<s%>, and bring me him <S%H5927>up<s%>, whom I shall <S%H559>name<s%> unto thee.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Behold, thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> what <S%H7586>Saul<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%>, how he hath cut <S%H3772>off<s%> those that have familiar <S%H178>spirits<s%>, and the <S%H3049>wizards<s%>, out of the <S%H776>land<s%>: wherefore then layest thou a <S%H5367>snare<s%> for my <S%H5315>life<s%>, to cause me to <S%H4191>die<s%>?

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> to her by the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, there <S%H518>shall<s%> no <S%H5771>punishment<s%> <S%H7136>happen<s%> to thee for this <S%H1697>thing<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%>, Whom shall I bring <S%H5927>up<s%> unto thee? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Bring me <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>.

And when the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, she <S%H2199>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>: and the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Why hast thou <S%H7411>deceived<s%> me? for thou art <S%H7586>Saul<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, Be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%>: for what <S%H7200>sawest<s%> thou? And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H5927>ascending<s%> out of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, What <S%H8389>form<s%> is he of? And she <S%H559>said<s%>, An <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> cometh <S%H5927>up<s%>; and he is <S%H5844>covered<s%> with a <S%H4598>mantle<s%>. And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that it was <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, and he <S%H6915>stooped<s%> with his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself.

¶ And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, Why hast thou <S%H7264>disquieted<s%> me, to bring me <S%H5927>up<s%>? And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%>, I am <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H6887>distressed<s%>; for the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> make <S%H3898>war<s%> against me, and <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5493>departed<s%> from me, and <S%H6030>answereth<s%> me no more, neither <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, nor by <S%H2472>dreams<s%>: therefore I have <S%H7121>called<s%> thee, that thou mayest make <S%H3045>known<s%> unto me what I shall <S%H6213>do<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, Wherefore then dost thou <S%H7592>ask<s%> of me, seeing the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H5493>departed<s%> from thee, and is become thine <S%H6145>enemy<s%>?

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> to him, as he <S%H1696>spake<s%> by <S%H3027>me<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7167>rent<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> out of thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H5414>given<s%> it to thy <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>, even to <S%H1732>David<s%>:

<S%H834>Because<s%> thou <S%H8085>obeyedst<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, nor <S%H6213>executedst<s%> his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> upon <S%H6002>Amalek<s%>, therefore hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> unto thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will also <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with thee into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: and to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> shalt thou and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> be with me: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> also shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H4116>straightway<s%> <S%H4393>all<s%> <S%H6967>along<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and was <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, because of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>: and there was no <S%H3581>strength<s%> in him; for he had <S%H398>eaten<s%> no <S%H3899>bread<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%>, nor all the <S%H3915>night<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he was <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H926>troubled<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Behold, thine <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> hath <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and I have <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> in my <S%H3709>hand<s%>, and have <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto thy <S%H1697>words<s%> which thou <S%H1696>spakest<s%> unto me.

Now therefore, I pray thee, <S%H8085>hearken<s%> thou also unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of thine <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>, and let me <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H6595>morsel<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; and <S%H398>eat<s%>, that thou mayest have <S%H3581>strength<s%>, when thou <S%H3212>goest<s%> on thy <S%H1870>way<s%>.

But he <S%H3985>refused<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, I will not <S%H398>eat<s%>. But his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, together with the <S%H802>woman<s%>, <S%H6555>compelled<s%> him; and he <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto their <S%H6963>voice<s%>. So he <S%H6965>arose<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> upon the <S%H4296>bed<s%>.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> had a <S%H4770>fat<s%> <S%H5695>calf<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>; and she <S%H4116>hasted<s%>, and <S%H2076>killed<s%> it, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7058>flour<s%>, and <S%H3888>kneaded<s%> it, and did <S%H644>bake<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> thereof:

And she <S%H5066>brought<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%>; and they did <S%H398>eat<s%>. Then they rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and went <S%H3212>away<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%>.
